statements: UPDATE GovernanceLogs SET action_taken = 'Approved minutes' WHERE log_id = 1

UPDATE GovernanceLogs SET action_taken = 'Approved the budget for Q3' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE GovernanceLogs SET meeting_date = '2022-09-15', action_taken = 'Discussed upcoming projects' WHERE meeting_type = 'Board Meeting';
UPDATE logs_of_meetings SET actions_taken = 'Reviewed and approved action items' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE governance_members SET member_role = 'Chairperson', member_name = 'Alice' WHERE member_id = 3;
UPDATE logs_of_meetings SET meeting_description = 'Updated meeting description' WHERE meeting_id = 1
UPDATE governance_members SET member_role = 'Chairperson', member_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE member_id = 3
UPDATE governance_meetings SET meeting_description = 'Discuss Quarterly Report' WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE meeting_notes SET note_content = 'Update action items' WHERE note_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE governance_meetings SET meeting_theme = 'Budget Planning Meeting', meeting_description = 'Discussing budget allocations for the next quarter' WHERE meeting_id = 'b195fced-257c-4c91-b06a-200742c7cb91';
UPDATE action_items SET item_description = 'Prepare budget presentation', assigned_to = 'John Doe', due_date = '2022-04-30' WHERE item_id = '26e10e6c-16f8-4539-b8d2-2c9b6315cbb4';
UPDATE governance_meetings SET meeting_topic='Board Meeting' WHERE meeting_id=1;
UPDATE meeting_actions SET action_description='Follow up with stakeholders' , action_status=TRUE WHERE meeting_id=1 AND action_id=3;
UPDATE governance_meetings SET meeting_topic = 'Board Strategy', meeting_notes = 'Discussing long-term goals' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE meeting_actions SET action_status = true, action_description = 'Completed action items' WHERE action_id = 5;
UPDATE governance_meetings SET meeting_topic='Quarterly Review', meeting_notes='Discuss financial performance' WHERE meeting_id=1;
UPDATE meeting_actions SET action_status='Completed', action_description='Follow up with clients' WHERE action_id=2;
UPDATE governance_meetings SET meeting_topic = 'Quarterly Review Board Meeting' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE meeting_attendees SET attendee_name = 'John Doe', meeting_id = 1 WHERE attendee_id = 1;
